data.actual_result: It has a highlight around it.
data.expected_result: Like all other sliders, even this one shouldn't have a circular highlight around it.
data.short_description: The slowmode timer slider is the only slider that has a circular highlight around it.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open channel settings of a server in which you have manage channels permission. - Long press the slider and move it. - Observe the highlight around it.
